entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Nivernians like order. They tend to have lawful alignments.

entries.name: Size
entries: Nivernian Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Nivernian, and either High or Low Common.

entries.name: Human Adaptability
entries: You have proficiency in one skill of your choice, and gain one feat of your choice.

entries.name: Well Travelled
entries: Growing up in Nivenac means you have done a lot of travelling whilst growing up. You have proficiency in land and air vehicles.
